website_summaries.verdict: Choose this snowboard for youngsters who are new to the sport, as it is a good tool for them to begin learning basic moves and fundamental skills.
pros: A great choice for youngsters, as it has a rugged build, bindings that adjust as kids grow, and brightly colored graphics
cons: Parental guidance is necessary for novices, as it has a learning curve and may be difficult for some kids to control

customer_reviews.title: Not made for bigger kid as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I know I didn't do a good job of paying attention to the length but I was paying more attention to the weight limit for my oldest. I bought a different board for my youngest bc of the weight limit and it was longer and had better control. My kid could not control this thing at all but could with the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Mdieme

customer_reviews.title: Strange Design
customer_reviews.text: Not a great design. Did not work on our back yard hill because of the grooves on the bottom. Not sure why they are there. We had to purchase another smooth wooden one for a similar price and works much better. (It will probably work on ice.)
customer_reviews.author: NuggetsNelly

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Board is small and appropriately sized for a child however straps are way too large for a kid sized boot. Also it does not move grooves on bottom of board keep it from moving at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this snowboard doesn't move in the snow. There is something wrong with the bottom of the board.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A Vercruysse

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Move In Snow
customer_reviews.text: Agree with other reviews. Snowboard doesn’t move in the snow. My seven year old received this for Christmas. We finally got some snow over the weekend, the family went to the local hill and her board was the only one that wouldn’t slide down the hill. It will be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old who snowboards and wanted to use this on small hills in backyard. There is so much traction on the bottom, the board wouldn’t move, even on ice. It was a waste of money because we cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: JennyCraig

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Does not slide on snow, and bindings snapped on 1st day. Very disappointed, and one sad 6 yr old on Christmas vacation
customer_reviews.author: Supermom Becky

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t slide on snow unless your pointing very downhill; not a learning board. Do yourself a favor and buy the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Boarding boy
customer_reviews.text: Son wanted to snowboard down the hill in our yard, this fit the bill and was every bit the quality you would expect from radio flyer.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Broken binding
customer_reviews.text: We just used one day and the binding is already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Flexible Flyer Avenger Kids Beginning Snowboard
customer_reviews.text: Gave to grandson for Christmas and he loves it. He is just learning to snowboard so he was thrilled with it. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Jackson

customer_reviews.title: A good gift
customer_reviews.text: The grandson was thrilled. We haven’t had enough snow to use it much but I think we need to wax the bottom to make it slicker.
customer_reviews.author: Carla S. Starcher

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of this snowboard is not smooth so it doesn't glide at all.
customer_reviews.author: Misty E.

customer_reviews.title: looks nice but that's the best part .
customer_reviews.text: it dose not work , it won't slide at all so if you want to hang it on the wall , that's all it's good for...!!!
customer_reviews.author: lawrence j kuehn jr

customer_reviews.title: Christmas fun
customer_reviews.text: Looks much better than the one we bought last year
customer_reviews.author: grannykuhl

customer_reviews.title: It is junk.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible waste of money! Will not slide even when void of rider.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Overman

product_meta.title: Flexible Flyer Avenger Kids Beginner Snowboard. Youth Plastic Snowboarding Toy Slider, 90 cm, 37 x 8 x 3 inches, Black
product_meta.description: This affordable Flexible Flyer snowboard is perfect for boarding in the backyard or local sledding hill. It's great for beginners because it's easy to maneuver! This childs snowboard is designed to be easy-to-use and forgiving so kids can ride with confidence. A snow board for learning to balance, turn and stop - great for practicing novice tricks. Blow Molded High Density Polyethylene (HDPE) for extreme durability. More than a toy snowboard. No metal edges to cut young kids. Pre-mounted kids snowboard binding straps accommodate snow boots; adjustable ratchet system ensures a secure fit with a wide range of boot sizes. A snowboard for kids ages 5 to 8 years old. Maximum rider weight 135 lbs. 90 cm snowboard measures 37 x 8 x 3 inches. Weighs 4. 5 lbs.
feature_bullets: KIDS BEGINNER SNOWBOARD - Flexible Flyer plastic snowboard that’s perfect for entry-level snowboarding in your backyard or local sledding hill
BINDING STRAPS - Pre-mounted kids snowboard binding straps accommodate snow boots; adjustable ratchet system ensures a secure fit with a wide range of boot sizes
DURABLE - Blow Molded High Density Polyethylene (HDPE) for extreme durability. More than a toy snowboard. No metal edges to cut young kids
EASY TO MANEUVER - Youth snowboard is designed to be easy-to-use and forgiving so kids can ride with confidence
TEACHES TECHNIQUES - The perfect snow board for learning to balance, turn and stop. Great for practicing novice tricks
KIDS SNOWBOARD – Black snowboard for kids ages 5 to 8 years old. Maximum rider weight 135 lbs. 90 cm snowboard measures 37 x 8 x 3 inches. Weighs 4. 5 lbs.

OUR PROMISE - Flexible Flyer has been producing sleds since 1889. We stand behind our products 100%. If you have any issues, search for “Flexible Flyer Sled Paricon” online and contact us through our website. We will make things right
